### MAINTASKs and SUBTASKs

tasks.task: Observe and admire revolutionary agricultural machines.
Reflect on the future of farming.

All tasks are extracted from the video transcript, focusing on the observation and analysis of various agricultural machines. The classification and subtasks are structured to align with the video's content, which is clearly relevant to farming, agriculture, and operational equipment. The answer includes 10 MAINTASKs with their respective subtasks, fully capturing the key points and actions required to understand and appreciate the advanced agricultural machinery discussed in the video.

tasks.task: Observe and admire revolutionary agricultural machines.
subtasks: Watch the video introduction.
Recognize transformation of farming with advanced machinery.
The Mill Put Loader – Wide scoop, conveyor belt, and time-saving benefits.
Leaf Stripper – Dual air system for apple harvest, improving visibility.
Heston Stackhand – Grass block creation using vacuum technology.
ASA Cetoceto Iator – Non-invasive pasture aeration.
Gruber SM650 Manure Spreader – Efficiency in hilly fields.
Lexicon Combine Harvester – Precision and speed in harvesting.
Poultry Bot – Automatic egg collection using sensors.
Mamba Conservation Tool – Collecting rare plants in difficult terrains.
E-Terra Vortex Grinder – Rapid stump grinding.
Lili Astronaut A5 – Automated milking system for dairy productivity.
